title: Weather Underground (Forecast Plus)
name: iwforecastplus
description: Provides local and long range weather forecast

preferences.name: accurate
preferences.title: Use decimal point in the badge number
preferences.description: By default, the current temperature is round to the nearest whole number. Check this option if you prefer the extension to display decimal point as well. Wait for the next update for this change to take place

preferences.name: faqs
preferences.title: Open FAQs page after each successful upgrade
preferences.description: By default, Weather Underground (Forecast Plus) opens the FAQs page upon upgrade to notify you about the recent changes. You can uncheck this box to prevent this
